name: Within The Caves: Speed-Running Edition
description:
Version (1.1.1)

Travel throughout a procedurally generated cavern to find the treasure deep inside! Jump, puff, and dodge enemies to reach the end! Improved from my entry in Weekly Game jam 49

Speed run edition comes with revamped movement calculations, instant restarts, lower input buffer, tons of bug fixes, and more!

If you want, join the speed run community of the game: https://www.speedrun.com/within_the_caves#Any

Or maybe join the small discord: https://discord.gg/Yh7Ss2cvpG
